action.action-desc: Mr. Collins introduced the following bill

form.official-title: To require the Secretary of Homeland Security to detain aliens who have been charged with certain crimes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the "Laken Riley Act".
The Secretary of Homeland Security shall issue a detainer for an alien who is described in subsection (a).

subsection.text: An alien described in this subsection is an alien who has been charged with, arrested for, convicted of, or who has admitted having committed any of the following offenses:

paragraph.text: Assault of a law enforcement officer.

subsection.text: The Secretary shall detain each alien described in subsection (a) until removal proceedings are completed.

section.text: This Act shall take effect 90 days after the date of the enactment of this Act.
